aboutPrioritiesText1: I write clean, readable and reusable code that is easy to maintain and understand.
aboutPrioritiesText2: My layouts work on any device, big or small, and look good on any screen.
aboutPrioritiesText3: Fast load times and lag free interaction, my highest priority.
aboutPrioritiesText4: Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI.
aboutContentDesc1: I'm a web developer based in Volgograd, Russia. I have a passion for web development and love to create websites and web applications.
aboutContentDesc2: I have experience in both front-end and back-end development, and I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.
aboutContentDesc3: I'm a self-taught developer and I'm constantly learning new things. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.
work1Description: We present our restaurants and unique dishes made with love. Discover a variety of cuisines and enjoy exquisite gastronomic experiences. Each restaurant offers signature recipes and a unique atmosphere.
work1Tech1: Structuring page content for better SEO and usability.
work1Tech2: Styling the site, including responsive design and animations.
work1Tech3: Efficiently writing styles using variables and nesting.
work1Tech4: Adding interactivity and enhancing user experience.
work1Tech5: Adapting the site for various devices.
work1Tech6: Automating tasks like file compilation and minification.
